beer.beer_description:
Qantelaar is the first beer of brewery "d’Oude Maalderij". 

We try to design and improve our recipes in order to create artisanal Belgian craft beers. The "Qantelaar" is created with 5 malts, a bit of candy sugar, 2 hops and ferments in the bottle. We use 30% more ingrediënts than a regular brown beer which gives it a great body and taste. We don’t add any herb, spice or chemical compound in this traditional Belgian brown strong beer.

Try to get a hold of it and enjoy the taste of what a good craft beer should taste like.

Dare to taste, learn to enjoy!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 225 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 46. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 290 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 59!

items.badge_description: At first taste, dark ales can be overwhelming for even the most skilled of beer drinkers, but your will is weak and with time you will eventually turn to the dark side. That's 45 different beers with the style of Dark Ale, Belgian Strong Dark Ale, Lager - Dark, IPA - Black / Cascadian Dark Ale or IPA - Imperial / Double Black, Schwarzbier, or Mild - Dark. Try 5 more for Level 10!

items.checkin_comment: Bottled 25 Aug 2012. This has held up really well. Slightly oxidised, but decent carbonation and very tasty.

user.bio: Transplanted Canadian who lives in the UK. I love beer and the other good things in life.

items.badge_description: You don’t have to be a superhero to enjoy a strong beer. Boasting a higher than average ABV, these styles really do pack a punch, so be ready for it. That's 135 different beers with style of Strong Ale - American, Strong Ale - English, Strong Ale - Other, Belgian Strong Dark Ale, Belgian Strong Golden Ale or Lager - Strong. Try 5 more for Level 28!
